title: Problems
body: This is dumb, I went 5-5 in my promo games and got placed into B5 whilst as atleast a couple months ago I went 4-6 (wins first and losses last) and got b1. This is dumb wtf riot

replies.body:
Every season, every ranked player undergoes a soft rank reset. 

This means that when you ended in bronze 5 last season, you would have started at a bronze 5 kind of MMR this season (since you can't go lower than that).  
Going 50/50 in placements indicates you are in the right kind of rank.

Last season was your first shot at ranked on this account, and every new account starts out at around silver 4.
